external_games.name: Flipper & Lopaka: The Secrets of the Deep
Flipper & Lopaka: The Secrets of the Deep

name: Flipper & Lopaka: The Secrets of the Deep
summary: A children's game about Flipper the dolphin and his human friend, Lopaka. Together, they must prevent archaeologists from taking priceless artifacts from the underwater city of Quetzo.
